data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Saki, the Crazed Little Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
data.detailed_description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

Saki, the crazed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," is here and ready to fight using her super long katana and acrobatics. Like her big sister Aya, she usually spends her time exterminating zombies, but she couldn't sit idly by while the Earth was in pieces. She may appear less "herself" here compared to her appearance in the "round" world, but that's to be expected in a world without curves. For her SP Move, she uses her family's Baneful blood to temporarily boost her attack power and become invincible. Now, THIS is truly Baneful power.

data.short_description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. Saki, the crazed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," is here and ready to fight using her super long katana and acrobatics.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
